name: Hey Turtle
storyline: You and Dana worked together for years before anything even happened. But now things are happening - and fast! Your relationship takes you to places you haven't even dreamed of, but when everyday life knocks on your door Dana doesn’t act the same way as before.
summary: Communicate with Dana in a messaging app and learn more about your relationship and how it started. Make your own choices to influence the story and decide the future for you and Dana.
